statements: SELECT artist_name, artwork_id FROM Artists WHERE supply = 'painting'
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE material_used = 'Oil'
SELECT artist_id, artist_name, artwork_id FROM Artists WHERE artist_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT artist_name, material_used FROM Artists WHERE artwork_id < 100
SELECT * FROM Artists ORDER BY material_used DESC, artist_name ASC
SELECT artist_name, material_used FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 1
SELECT artist_name, supply FROM Artists WHERE material_used = 'Oil' ORDER BY supply DESC
SELECT artist_name, artwork_id FROM Artists WHERE material_used = 'Watercolor' AND supply = 'Brushes' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE artist_id IN (2, 5, 7)
SELECT artist_name, material_used, supply FROM Artists WHERE supply LIKE '%Paint%'
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_email FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Artworks WHERE material_used = 'Acrylic';
SELECT artwork_id, artwork_title FROM Artworks ORDER BY artwork_id DESC;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, material_used FROM Artists, Artworks WHERE Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id;
SELECT artist_name, artist_email FROM Artists WHERE artist_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM Artists JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name;

SELECT artist_name, artwork_title, material_used, supply_used FROM Artists JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id WHERE material_used LIKE '%canvas%' AND supply_used NOT LIKE '%paint%';
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM Artists LEFT JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(*) < 3;
SELECT artist_name, artist_email, COUNT(*) AS total_artworks FROM Artists JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, email FROM Artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Artworks ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT artwork_name, price FROM Artworks WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supply_name, supplier, price FROM Supplies WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY supply_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Artists ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, email FROM Artists WHERE birthdate >= '1980-01-01';
SELECT artwork_name, price FROM Artworks WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, supply_name, price FROM Artists INNER JOIN Supplies ON Artists.artist_id = Supplies.supply_id WHERE supplier = 'Supplier A';
SELECT artist_name, email, creation_date FROM Artists LEFT JOIN Artworks ON Artists.artist_id = Artworks.artist_id ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_location FROM Artists;
SELECT * FROM Artwork WHERE artist_id = 3;
SELECT artwork_title, creation_date FROM Artwork WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT a.artist_name, am.material_id FROM Artists a JOIN ArtworkMaterials am ON a.artist_id = am.artwork_id;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM Artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artwork_title, creation_date FROM Artwork WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT a.artist_name, aw.artwork_title, m.material_name FROM Artists a JOIN Artwork aw ON a.artist_id = aw.artist_id JOIN ArtworkMaterials am ON aw.artwork_id = am.artwork_id JOIN Materials m ON am.material_id = m.material_id;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(artwork_id) AS num_artworks FROM Artists JOIN Artwork ON Artists.artist_id = Artwork.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_artworks > 5 ORDER BY num_artworks DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_email FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE artist_id = 1 ORDER BY artwork_name DESC;

SELECT artist_name, material_name FROM artists INNER JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id INNER JOIN artwork_materials ON artworks.artwork_id = artwork_materials.artwork_id INNER JOIN materials ON artwork_materials.material_id = materials.material_id;

SELECT artwork_name, material_name, quantity_used FROM artworks INNER JOIN artwork_materials ON artworks.artwork_id = artwork_materials.artwork_id INNER JOIN materials ON artwork_materials.material_id = materials.material_id WHERE artworks.artist_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity_used ASC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_email FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artwork_name, material_name FROM artworks JOIN artwork_materials ON artworks.artwork_id = artwork_materials.artwork_id JOIN materials ON artwork_materials.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) as total_artworks FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name;
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity_used) as total_quantity FROM materials JOIN artwork_materials ON materials.material_id = artwork_materials.material_id GROUP BY material_name;

SELECT DISTINCT artist_name, artist_email FROM artists JOIN artworks ON artists.artist_id = artworks.artist_id WHERE artworks.artwork_id IN (SELECT artwork_id FROM artwork_materials WHERE material_id = 1);
